main event: Two trained balloon observers reported seeing an unidentified flying object at Holloman Air Force Base on 5 April 1948.
interesting points: The object was described as moving faster than any known aircraft., It exhibited violent maneuvers, including making large loops., The observers agreed that it was very high in the sky and possessed a rounded, indistinct form., There was no audible noise heard from the object during the observation., The object disappeared suddenly after being in sight for approximately 30 seconds.
location: Holloman Air Force Base, New Mexico, USA
witness description: trained balloon observers from the Physics Lab Section
